mapper.select: SELECT A.ID, A.TITLE, A.IMGPATH, A.HIT FROM (SELECT * FROM IMAGE WHERE TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query},'%') ORDER BY HIT DESC LIMIT #{start}, 32)A
SELECT A.ID, A.TITLE, A.IMGPATH, A.HIT FROM (SELECT * FROM IMAGE WHERE THEME = #{theme} ORDER BY HIT DESC LIMIT #{start}, 32)A
SELECT A.ID, A.TITLE, A.IMGPATH, A.HIT FROM (SELECT * FROM IMAGE WHERE WHERE CONTEXT = #{context} ORDER BY HIT DESC LIMIT #{start}, 32)A
SELECT ID, TITLE, IMGPATH, HIT FROM IMAGE WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IMAGE ( TITLE, IMGPATH, HIT, THEME, CONTEXT) VALUES( #{title}, #{imgPath}, 0, #{theme}, #{context})
mapper.update: UPDATE IMAGE SET HIT=HIT+1 WHERE ID = #{id}
